mema jalashayehi wellehi usa mitar 50 k wana athara, diga mitar 196 ki.puhulpola jalashaye sita mi.3975 k digathi umangak magin dayaraba jalashayata ekkaraganna jalaya, ethan sita wallawaya pradeshiya lekam kotasata ayath rakkitha kandehi kurullangala namathi sthanaya dakwa ki.mi 15 1/2 (pahalowa hamarak) ka umangak magin genayanu labe.mema jalasha idikirima nisa iwath wana pawulwalata dan moragolla, katakalla, mirahawaththa yana pradeshawala nawa niwasa idikaranu labe.mema wyapruthiye wada katayuthu injineru karyayan pilibanda madhyama upadeshaka karyanshaya kala adhyayana warthawa anuwa sidu kere.
